resources.string: FadCam app da FadSec Lab suite yo hissa da. Nur maloomat da paara, laandi \'Source Code ogorai\' bandi click kai.

FadCam yao ad-free, open-source video recording app da che privacy ta tarjeeh warkawi aw sta data na track kai aw na ye jama kai. Da sirf pa GitHub aw pa README ke che kam official links di, sirf alta dastiyab de.

FadCam pa mashhoor YouTube channels bandi feature shawe de, agha ke HowToMen aw Xtream Droid shamil di, aw da GrapheneOS aw 18 nor articles ki ham feature shwe de.
Community join kae, madad, ideas share kawalo, aw mustaqbil app updates da paara

\n Dumra Zay shta:
%.2f GB / %.2f GB

Da Record wakh (andaza):
FHD: %s
HD: %s
SD: %s

Ter shawi wakh:
%02d:%02d
Paati wakh:
%s \n

string-array.name: tips_widget
string-array.item: 1/11 | Preview bandi ogad tap okai che band shi.
2/11 | Date widget bandi ogad tap okai che clock display ogorai.
3/11 | Storage widget pa realtime ki recording space update kai.
4/11 | Stats widget videos aw istemal shawe space khai.
5/11 | Video quality (HD, SD, FHD) pa settings ke badlede shi.
6/11 | Kam space de? Video quality kam kai zyat recording wakh da paara.
7/11 | Settings ki watermark add kai.
8/11 | Exact location acholo la settings ki option ogorae.
9/11 | Makhi wala camera na record kol di? Settings ki select kae.
10/11 | Da app preferences save kigi aw agha pakhpala apply kigi.
11/11 | Madad pakar de? About ki Discord link shte alta na join kae.

resources.string:
\n Videos: %d
Istemal shawe Zay: %s \n
Watermark option intikhab kai\n(Default: Timestamp sara da FadCam)
Oke zar video save kol we, nu \'No Watermark\' intekhab kae. Watermark am add kol gware? Nu byam hes khabara nada, bs lag wakh ba der akhli!
Da location data am watermark ki shamil kae. \nGPS pehla zaruri on kol de \n(Default: Disabled)
Da Phone GPS enable kae, da latitude aw longitude data watermark ke shaamil kolo dapara.

string-array.name: easter_eggs_array
string-array.item: Oo! Dalta nashi ratlay. Recording shuru ka pehla che access darkam.
Ta yo khaas button omuntalo! kho da sam nakai lol
Zarrr sha! Sta system alutoo wala deâ€¦ ya kideshi sirf recording shuru kolo sara theek shi.
Asi, ajeeba kas ye yaraâ€¦
Sta da Bugatti kam rung de?
Za de dapara na ym program shwe sa che rasara ta ke lagya. Yo minute, ta ma hack ke kho na?

string-array.name: questions_array
string-array.item: DISCLAIMER
FadCam da user data jama kai zan sara?
Di app ki ishtehar am shta?
FadCam da location access wali gwari?
FadCam internet sara am connect kegi?
Hes runga data pa external servers bande store kegi?
Zama videos sara sa kegi record kolo na pas?
FadCam zama data third party services ta legi?
General
Da watermarking dumra der wakh wali akhli?
Da \'temp\' num wala video sa shae de?
Za video quality sanga badlole sham?
Za da preview video band kole sham?
Za location sanga pa watermark ki achole sham?
Zama preferences de app ki save kegi?
Za scheduled recordings kole sham?
Da app za sanga update kole sham?

string-array.name: answers_array
string-array.item: FadCam hes am ghair akhlaqi ya illegal istemal la nade. Misuse, da cha surveillance ya privacy ki da dakhal, zamung da guidelines khilaf di. Da de app authors hes qisam am misuse jawabgar na di.
Na, FadCam hes kisam user data na jama kai.
Na, FadCam bilkul ad-free dai.
Da location info watermark ke shaamil kawalo dapara.
Na, FadCam internet sara connect na dai.
Na, tola data sta pa device bandi store kigi.
Sta videos sta pa device ki internal app storage ke save kigi.
Na, FadCam da data share ya jamakol na kai.
Watermark har frame ke shaamil kigi. Ogad video we nu, zyat wakh ba akhli.
\'Temp\' video sta asli recording dai. Da watermarking process na pas pakhpala delete kigi. Oke watermarking fail she, no \'temp\' file backup pa tor bandi prot we.
Video quality settings ke badal kideshi: HD, SD, or FHD.
Preview wala zay bandi, disable kawalo dapara, long press okai.
Location settings ke enable kae, che watermark ke da location data shaamil she. Da precise longitude aw latitude data shaamil kai.
Ao, preferences aw tol settings save kegi ao pakhpala apply kigi.
Da feature ba bad ki razi, In Sha Allah.
Updates dapara, official GitHub repo check kae.

resources.string: Zaruri khabara: Da app la development ki de. Nawi features wakh sara add kegi.

â€¢ New UI design
â€¢ Videos now save internally in the app
â€¢ Option to save videos to gallery
â€¢ Customizable watermarking
â€¢ ExoPlayer integration for better playback
â€¢ Location data in watermarks
â€¢ Dynamic watermark options
â€¢ Long press feedback with animations
â€¢ Date and Time widget customization

â€¢ Auto-scheduled recordings 
â€¢ Auto-uploading to Google Drive 
â€¢ Custom app icons 
â€¢ App lock for enhanced privacy 
â€¢ In-app video editor for simple tasks like trimming 
â€¢ And many more exciting features!
Video save kolo ke fail shwa
Ya darust position nade ya video list null dai
Pa rishtiya da video delete kol gwari?
Ta pa rishtya gware che da video(s) da safae hasti na mitao kam? ðŸš€ðŸ’¥
Ao, Pa daz e ola! ðŸŒ‹
Di app ta da location permission zarurat dai, location data videos ke shaamil kolo la. Mehrbani oka ao permission warka warla.
Stasu pehla na latest version bandi de.
Yo nawe version (%1$s) milaoshu. Update kolo dapara, F-Droid store ya GitHub repository na download kae.
Ta tol videos delete kol gware?
